ladder

Class Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ladder.Generator

  • public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generator find a 'random' ladder of a given depth (if available) by performing a recursive depth-first search
    Author:
    Tom Leaman (thl5@aber.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> generateLadder(java.lang.String start, int depth)
      Returns a ladder of the specified depth starting with word if one is available, otherwise it returns an empty list

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • generateLadder

        public java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> generateLadder(java.lang.String start,
                                                  int depth)
        Returns a ladder of the specified depth starting with word if one is available, otherwise it returns an empty list
        Parameters:
        start - the first word of the ladder
        depth - the depth of the ladder
        Returns:
        a collection of Strings contained in the ladder
